subtitle: Finally, we are getting married!
rsvpIntro: We'd love to know if you can make it! Please let us know by {{deadline}} so we can make sure everything is perfect for you.
welcome: We are pleased to invite you to celebrate with us one of the most important days of our lives.
scheduleBody: Want to know every detail of the day? Check out the <scheduleLink>full schedule</scheduleLink>.
questionsBody: If you have any questions, feel free to call us, write to us, or check <qaLink>the questions page</qaLink>.
